100% working... i used the following method and its working fine.. 
Sony DVD+R DL 8.5GB
LG DVD Burner
IMGBurn 2.5.6.0

1. Open IMGBurn and select "write image files to disk"
2. Go to Tools>settings>write> select the option of "calculate optimal" for layer break.
3. Select Ace87.dvd (COD MW3)
4. Write speed should be 2.4x and start burning
5. You will come up with two options..select "Truncate.. write until end of Disc"
6. Once you complete the burning process, install the game on your console and enjoy.

P.S. Not tested online and on verbatim DVDz
